languages.text: "Когда бабочка играет с огнем, она неизменно теряет крылья". {n}Эльдар неодобрительно косится на Маражая, и тонкие губы кривятся в легкой ухмылке.{/n} "Боишься меня, дитя теней? Правильно. После всего, что твой кабал сделал с моими братьями, тебе стоит трепетать от ужаса и молить о прощении".

traits.locale_text: "Когда бабочка играет с огнем, она неизменно теряет крылья". {n}Эльдар неодобрительно косится на Маражая, и тонкие губы кривятся в легкой ухмылке.{/n} "Боишься меня, дитя теней? Правильно. После всего, что твой кабал сделал с моими братьями, тебе стоит трепетать от ужаса и молить о прощении".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "When a butterfly plays with fire, it loses its wings every time." {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."
languages.original_text: "Когда бабочка играет с огнем, она неизменно теряет крылья". {n}Эльдар неодобрительно косится на Маражая, и тонкие губы кривятся в легкой ухмылке.{/n} "Боишься меня, дитя теней? Правильно. После всего, что твой кабал сделал с моими братьями, тебе стоит трепетать от ужаса и молить о прощении".

That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble with fear and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: "When a butterfly plays with fire, it loses its wings every time." {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «Cuando las mariposas juegan con fuego, siempre pierden las alas». {n}El Aeldari mira de soslayo a Marazhai con gesto de desaprobación, y una leve sonrisa de burla asoma a sus delgados labios.{/n} «¿Me tienes miedo, hijo de las sombras? Eso es bueno. Después de todo lo que tu kábala le ha hecho a mi gente, deberías estar temblando de miedo y suplicando mi perdón».
languages.original_text: "When a butterfly plays with fire, it loses its wings every time." {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando las mariposas juegan con fuego, siempre pierden las alas». {n}El Aeldari mira de soslayo a Marazhai con gesto de desaprobación, y una leve sonrisa de burla asoma a sus delgados labios.{/n} «¿Me tienes miedo, hijo de las sombras? Eso es bueno. Después de todo lo que tu kábala le ha hecho a mi gente, deberías estar temblando de miedo y suplicando mi perdón».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「火と戯れる蝶は、いつも羽を失う」{n}アエルダリはマラズハイを不満そうに横目で見ると、かすかな苦笑いを浮かべ、その薄い唇を美しく見せた。{/n}「影の子よ、私を恐れているのか？いいことだ。お前の陰謀団が我がキンにしたことを考えれば、お前は恐怖に震えて許しを請うべきだからな」
languages.original_text: "When a butterfly plays with fire, it loses its wings every time." {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: 「火と戯れる蝶は、いつも羽を失う」{n}アエルダリはマラズハイを不満そうに横目で見ると、かすかな苦笑いを浮かべ、その薄い唇を美しく見せた。{/n}「影の子よ、私を恐れているのか？いいことだ。お前の陰謀団が我がキンにしたことを考えれば、お前は恐怖に震えて許しを請うべきだからな」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “蝴蝶扑向火焰，便会失去自己的翅膀。”{n}艾达灵族不以为然地斜睨着玛拉斋，薄薄的嘴唇上咧出挖苦的微笑。{/n}“你是在害怕我吗，暗影之子？这很好。你的阴谋团对我的族人做了那么多坏事，你确实该在恐惧中颤抖，乞求原谅。”
languages.original_text: "When a butterfly plays with fire, it loses its wings every time." {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: “蝴蝶扑向火焰，便会失去自己的翅膀。”{n}艾达灵族不以为然地斜睨着玛拉斋，薄薄的嘴唇上咧出挖苦的微笑。{/n}“你是在害怕我吗，暗影之子？这很好。你的阴谋团对我的族人做了那么多坏事，你确实该在恐惧中颤抖，乞求原谅。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Lorsqu'un papillon joue avec le feu, il ne manque jamais de perdre ses ailes. » {n}L'Aeldari lance un regard oblique réprobateur à Marazhai, et ses lèvres fines esquissent un sourire narquois.{/n} « Auriez-vous peur de moi, enfant de l'ombre ? C'est une bonne chose. Après tout ce que votre kabale a fait à mon peuple, vous devriez trembler de terreur et implorer mon pardon. »
languages.original_text: "When a butterfly plays with fire, it loses its wings every time." {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: « Lorsqu'un papillon joue avec le feu, il ne manque jamais de perdre ses ailes. » {n}L'Aeldari lance un regard oblique réprobateur à Marazhai, et ses lèvres fines esquissent un sourire narquois.{/n} « Auriez-vous peur de moi, enfant de l'ombre ? C'est une bonne chose. Après tout ce que votre kabale a fait à mon peuple, vous devriez trembler de terreur et implorer mon pardon. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Wenn Schmetterlinge mit dem Feuer spielen, verlieren sie immer ihre Flügel." {n}Der Aeldari wirft Marazhai einen missbilligenden Blick von der Seite zu, dabei verformen sich seine schmalen Lippen zu einem leicht schiefen Lächeln.{/n} "Ihr fürchtet Euch vor mir, Kind der Schatten? Das ist gut. Nach allem, was Eure Kabale meiner Art angetan hat, solltet Ihr vor Furcht erzittern und um Vergebung betteln."
languages.original_text: "When a butterfly plays with fire, it loses its wings every time." {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Schmetterlinge mit dem Feuer spielen, verlieren sie immer ihre Flügel." {n}Der Aeldari wirft Marazhai einen missbilligenden Blick von der Seite zu, dabei verformen sich seine schmalen Lippen zu einem leicht schiefen Lächeln.{/n} "Ihr fürchtet Euch vor mir, Kind der Schatten? Das ist gut. Nach allem, was Eure Kabale meiner Art angetan hat, solltet Ihr vor Furcht erzittern und um Vergebung betteln."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Kelebek ne zaman ki ateşle oynar, her sefer kanatlarını kaybeder." {n}Aeldari, Marazhai'a göz ucuyla onaylamaz bir bakış atıyor. Bükülen ince dudakları, belli belirsiz bir gülümseme lütfediyor.{/n} "Benden korkuyor musun gölgelerin çocuğu? Güzel. Kabalının soydaşlarıma yaptığı onca şeyden sonra korkudan titreyip af dilemelisin."
languages.original_text: "When a butterfly plays with fire, it loses its wings every time." {n}The Aeldari gives Marazhai a disapproving sidelong glance, and a hint of a wry smile graces his thin lips.{/n} "Are you afraid of me, child of the shadows? That is good. After everything your Kabal has done to my kin, you ought to tremble in terror and beg for forgiveness."

traits.locale_text: "Bir kelebek ne zaman ki ateşle oynar, her sefer kanatlarını kaybeder." {n}Aeldari, Marazhai'a göz ucuyla onaylamayan bir bakış atıyor. Bükülen ince dudakları, belli belirsiz bir gülümseme lütfediyor.{/n} "Benden korkuyor musun gölgelerin çocuğu? Güzel. Kabalının soydaşlarıma yaptığı onca şeyden sonra korku içinde titreyip af dilenmen gerek."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
